options.name: customDir
options.desc: Base directory for custom templates and other options. If services.forgejo.useWizard is disabled (default), this directory will also hold secrets and the resulting app.ini config at runtime.

options.name: database.createDatabase
options.desc: Whether to create a local database automatically.

options.name: database.host
options.desc: Database host address.

options.name: database.name
options.desc: Database name.

options.name: database.passwordFile
options.desc: A file containing the password corresponding to services.forgejo.database.user.

options.name: database.path
options.desc: Path to the sqlite3 database file.

options.name: database.port
options.desc: Database host port.
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)

options.name: database.socket
options.desc: Path to the unix socket file to use for authentication.

options.name: database.type
options.desc: Database engine to use.

options.name: database.user
options.desc: Database user.

options.name: dump.backupDir
options.desc: Path to the directory where the dump archives will be stored.

options.name: dump.enable
options.desc: Whether to enable periodic dumps via the built-in dump command.

options.name: dump.file
options.desc: Filename to be used for the dump. If null a default name is chosen by forgejo.

options.name: dump.interval
options.desc: Run a Forgejo dump at this interval. Runs by default at 04:31 every day. The format is described in systemd.time(7).

options.name: dump.type
options.desc: Archive format used to store the dump file.

options.name: enable
options.desc: Whether to enable Forgejo, a software forge.

options.name: group
options.desc: Group under which Forgejo runs.

options.name: lfs.contentDir
options.desc: Where to store LFS files.

options.name: lfs.enable
options.desc: Enables git-lfs support.

options.name: package
options.desc: The forgejo package to use.

options.name: repositoryRoot
options.desc: Path to the git repositories.

options.name: secrets
options.desc: This is a small wrapper over systemd’s LoadCredential. It takes the same sections and keys as services.forgejo.settings, but the value of each key is a path instead of a string or bool. The path is then loaded as credential, exported as environment variable and then feed through https://codeberg.org/forgejo/forgejo/src/branch/forgejo/contrib/environment-to-ini/environment-to-ini.go. It does the required environment variable escaping for you.  Keys specified here take priority over the ones in services.forgejo.settings!
options.type: attribute set of attribute set of path

options.name: settings
options.desc: Free-form settings written directly to the app.ini configfile file. Refer to https://forgejo.org/docs/latest/admin/config-cheat-sheet/ for supported values.
options.type: attribute set of section of an INI file (attrs of INI atom (null, bool, int, float or string))

options.name: settings.log.LEVEL
options.desc: General log level.

options.name: settings.log.ROOT_PATH
options.desc: Root path for log files.

options.name: settings.server.DISABLE_SSH
options.desc: Disable external SSH feature.

options.name: settings.server.DOMAIN
options.desc: Domain name of your server.

options.name: settings.server.HTTP_ADDR
options.desc: Listen address. Must be a path when using a unix socket.

options.name: settings.server.HTTP_PORT
options.desc: Listen port. Ignored when using a unix socket.
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)

options.name: settings.server.PROTOCOL
options.desc: Listen protocol. +unix means “over unix”, not “in addition to.”

options.name: settings.server.ROOT_URL
options.desc: Full public URL of Forgejo server.

options.name: settings.server.SSH_PORT
options.desc: SSH port displayed in clone URL. The option is required to configure a service when the external visible port differs from the local listening port i.e. if port forwarding is used.
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)

options.name: settings.server.STATIC_ROOT_PATH
options.desc: Upper level of template and static files path.

options.name: settings.session.COOKIE_SECURE
options.desc: Marks session cookies as “secure” as a hint for browsers to only send them via HTTPS. This option is recommend, if Forgejo is being served over HTTPS.

options.name: stateDir
options.desc: Forgejo data directory.

options.name: useWizard
options.desc: Whether to use the built-in installation wizard instead of declaratively managing the app.ini config file in nix.

options.name: user
options.desc: User account under which Forgejo runs.
